subjective: What is the patiends history of present illness? Include the symptom dimensions of PQRST - Provocation, Quality, Region, Severity, Time, and associated symptoms

Provide the detail review of the patient's system - Cardiovascular, Respiratory, Gastrointestinal, Genitourinary, Musculoskeletal, Integumentary, Neurological, Endocrine, Hematologic, Lymphatic, Immunologic, Psychiatric, and Allergic/Immunologic
What is the patient's past medical history? Include details of the patient's past illness, surgeries, hospitalizations, and any other medical conditions
What are the current medications of the patient? Include the dosage and frequency of the medications
Does patient have any allergies? If yes, what are the allergies and what are the reaction of the allergies?
What is the patient's family history? Include the details of the patient's family members and their medical conditions
What is the patient's social history? Include the details of the patient's occupation, living condition, and any other social habits
objective: What are the patient's vital signs? List them all - HeartRate, BloodPressure, Temperature, RespiratoryRate, OxygenSaturation

What are the patient's physical examination findings? Include the details of the patient's general appearance, skin, head, eyes, ears, nose, throat, neck, chest, lungs, heart, abdomen, extremities, and neurological system
What are the patient's laboratory results? Include the details of the patient's blood test, urine test, X-rays, and any other laboratory tests
Assessment: In one sentence, what is the doctor's assessment of the patient's condition?
List all the problmes faced by the patient.
For each problem, provide the detailed description for it. Include the details of the problem, the cause of the problem, and the severity of the problem
What are the differnt diagnosis for the patient? List them all
Plan: With the help of the doctor's diagnosis, what plan is recommended for the patient, including the medications, procedures, tests, consultations?
What's patient's education plan? Include the details of the patient's education plan, and the patient's understanding of the plan
What Pharmacotherapy is recommended for the patient? Include the details of the medication, dosage, frequency, and duration of the medication
What are the other Therapeutic Procedures recommended for the patient? Include the details of the procedure, and the duration of the procedure
What are the follow-up plans for the patient?
